head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths BYRNE, DOROTHY SMITH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths BYRNE, DOROTHY SMITH

block.p: BYRNE--Dorothy Smith, of Riverdale, NY on April 20, 2007. Wife of the late Charles R. Byrne. Mother of Alison and the late Anthony, Michael, and Nicholas. Grandmother of Schuyler, Blair, Alexis, Ashley and Graham. Sister of Phyllis Riker and Elaine Ryan. Service at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville on Monday April 23 at 10:30am.

BYRNE--Dorothy Smith, of Riverdale, NY on April 20, 2007. Wife of the late Charles R. Byrne. Mother of Alison and the late Anthony, Michael, and Nicholas. Grandmother of Schuyler, Blair, Alexis, Ashley and Graham. Sister of Phyllis Riker and Elaine Ryan. Service at the Fred H. McGrath & Son Funeral Home, Bronxville on Monday April 23 at 10:30am.
